paper_title.ja: 沖縄島周辺における軽石の漂着とサンゴ礁生物
ヨルダン：大地溝と高地、砂漠の大地
ヨルダンを撮影した歴史的空中写真の検索･表示･カラー化システムの 構築とそれを活用した国士舘ヨルダンプロジェクト

description.ja: 1950年代初頭に撮影されたまま、長らく放置されていた英軍撮影の空中写真を整理し、GIS上で検索・表示するシステムを構築した。また、これらモノクロ写真カラー化することで、急激な地形改変や植生変化を受けたヨルダン低地を中心とする地域の景観を復元することが可能であることを示唆した。そのうえで、国士舘大学地理学教室を中心とすメンバーによる研究計画の概要を述べた。

paper_title.en: The coral δ15N record of terrestrial nitrate loading varies with river catchment land use.
paper_title.ja: The coral δ15N record of terrestrial nitrate loading varies with river catchment land use.

description.en:
We analysed the nitrogen isotopes in two coral cores (δ15Ncoral) from the mouth of the Todoroki River, Ishigaki Island, Japan, to examine whether the δ15Ncoral reflects the run-off of nitrate related to the land use in the river catchment. The two coral cores were used to examine the seasonal variation in δ15Ncoral for 14 years (CORE1
 1993–2007) and the annual variation of δ15Ncoral for 52 years (CORE2
 1958–2010). In CORE1, the 5-month running mean of δ15Ncoral was positively correlated with that of monthly precipitation, excluding all strong precipitation events (&gt
150 mm d−1). In CORE2, the δ15Ncoral mean in the earlier period (1958–1980) was 1.0 ‰ greater than that in the later period (1981–2010). The annual averages of δ15Ncoral are positively correlated with the total precipitation in the rainy season (May–June) for both time periods. The difference in the δ15Ncoral between the earlier and later periods is probably caused by the land use changed from paddy fields with 15N-rich manure to sugar cane fields in the early 1980s. Although some uncertainties still remain regarding the precision of δ15N coral proxy records, this study emphasises the clear potential for their use in reconstructing terrestrial nitrate discharge records from corals.
